questions.question_text: “flexibility” の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: the ability to change easily
the state of being firm and unchanging
the ability to work quickly
the control of strict rules
questions.example_sentence: Our company values flexibility in work arrangements.

questions.question_text: “approve” の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: to officially accept or agree to something
to reject an idea or plan
to suggest a new proposal
to check something carefully
questions.example_sentence: Each manager must approve the remote work schedule.

questions.question_text: “coverage” の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: the range of responsibility someone manages
the payment from an insurance policy
the process of advertising a product
the time period of a vacation
questions.example_sentence: Managers need to ensure adequate in-office coverage.

questions.question_text: “require” の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: to need or demand something
to delay or postpone something
to decide or conclude something
to report or record something
questions.example_sentence: All remote employees are required to attend the meeting.

questions.question_text: “representative” の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: a person who speaks or acts for a group
a person who is learning as a trainee
a customer who buys a product
a person who reviews company finances
questions.example_sentence: Please contact your HR representative for more details.
